subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United maintained its title charge by beating Tottenham, 5-2, after a remarkable second-half comeback wiped out visiting Tottenham’s two-goal advantage. United is 3 points clear at the top of the Premier League.
snippet: Manchester United maintained its title charge by beating Tottenham, 5-2, after a remarkable second-half comeback wiped out visiting Tottenham’s two-goal advantage. United is 3 points clear at the top of the Premier League.
